Center for Urban Science and Progress Doctoral Track
Center for Urban Science and Progress Doctoral Track

Requirements for the doctorate in Urban Science: Complexity, Informatics, & Sensing at the Center for Urban Science and Progress. Includes descriptions for the complexity, informatics, and sensing courses; the urban science colloquium; the dissertation component; and admission information.
